duties_responsibilities.duty: Be an ambassador of the Workplace Strategy & Operations team, ensuring all employees have a comfortable and efficient work space to perform well in their job.
Demonstrate strong judgment with a proactive, solution-oriented mindset to assist with keeping the office operating as a well-oiled machine.

Learn and become an owner of the 
ins and outs
 of what happens behind the scenes in our super busy office environment, and what it takes to help our teams perform at high levels.
Keep a watchful eye on our communal spaces, kitchens, and meeting rooms and take initiative to ensure those areas are presentable, functional, appropriately stocked, and organized on a daily basis.

Use our internal communications system and ticketing system for receiving and responding to employee requests/issues, determining the nature of the problem(s) and either completing the request or recommending appropriate solutions in a timely manner.
Oversee set-ups and tear-downs of multi-purpose spaces, meeting rooms, and training rooms.
Assist with maintaining/updating team resources, data and communications.
Maintain clean and well-organized inventory of supplies and storage spaces.
Move continuously between our various office floors for extended periods of time, and be able to lift/move at least 25 lbs.
Other office projects, tasks, and duties as needed.
